## Definition of Done

### Required (All Branches)

- [ ] `/check-format` passes - Fountain syntax valid
- [ ] `/check-continuity` passes - No consistency issues
- [ ] Spell check passes
- [ ] Self-review completed

### Branch-Specific

#### For scene branches

- [ ] Scene has clear purpose (something changes)
- [ ] Dialogue sounds natural when read aloud
- [ ] Action lines are visual and present tense

#### For revision branches

- [ ] Full script impact assessed
- [ ] Changes consistent across affected scenes
- [ ] No unintended side effects

#### For character branches

- [ ] Character voice consistent throughout
- [ ] Arc progression verified
- [ ] Dialogue rings true to character

#### For structure branches

- [ ] `/analyze-structure` reviewed
- [ ] Pacing feels right
- [ ] Story beats land at appropriate times

#### For fix branches

- [ ] Issue demonstrably fixed
- [ ] No new issues introduced

#### For draft to main

- [ ] Full validation passes
- [ ] Ready for external delivery
- [ ] Page count within target range
